name: Eternal Man: Village
description: A bite-sized survival horror game. Manage stamina and sanity to avoid your pursuers long enough to complete your mission.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel® Core™2 Duo Processor E7200 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 510 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: n/a Additional Notes: Very minimal system requirements.
